item.description:
To everyone who wishes to attend this meet and any in the future:

Please be advised that nobody actually plays D&D at these meets. They are a venue for people to meet each other and find games to play in. If you are new to D&D, I suggest you attend to find a group or contact other groups on the meetup message board to find great people to play with. Good luck and I hope you have as much fun with this hobby as I have over the last 20 years.

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons January Meetup
